title: League of Legends Client Lag
body:
Hi all,

I've been having horrible lag when I open the League of Legends client. Even if I just want to click on my match history, it can take up to 5 minutes. This has been happening for the past month. I have Windows 10. Also, when I am able to join games (which is rare nowadays due to the client lag), my Windows task-bar will appear at the bottom of the screen, and I can't remove it no matter what I do. Can someone please help?

replies.body: the blinking happens to me too

> [{quoted}](name=0someone0,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=7L7U6p3W,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-10-17T05:11:33.374+0000)
>
> the blinking happens to me too

I hope something can be done about this! I miss playing League. :(

It sounds like your client is establishing a really poor connection to the servers. I strongly recommend ensuring your local network settings are compatible with League by working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).

Let me know if you notice any changes after working through those steps.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=7L7U6p3W,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-17T01:38:34.054+0000)
>
> It sounds like your client is establishing a really poor connection to the servers. I strongly recommend ensuring your local network settings are compatible with League by working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).
> 
> Let me know if you notice any changes after working through those steps.

I went through all of the steps, and I even updated my graphics card, and nothing has changed. The client still lags, and my task-bar keeps blinking once it opens. :(

I spoke with our tech team and they suggest this may be caused by either a background application or a Windows 10 service. I recommend [disabling the Windows Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) and [perform a clean boot.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq3)

Let me know if either of those steps helped.

This worked! Thank you!
